statements: SELECT * FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT victim_name, email_address, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims WHERE amount_lost > 1000;
SELECT victim_name, email_address, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims WHERE date_of_incident > '2021-01-01';
SELECT victim_id, victim_name, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims ORDER BY amount_lost DESC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT victim_name, amount_lost, date_of_incident FROM phishing_victims ORDER BY date_of_incident DESC;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims WHERE amount_lost > 1000 ORDER BY amount_lost DESC;
SELECT victim_name, email_address, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims WHERE date_of_incident BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(amount_lost) AS max_amount_lost, MIN(amount_lost) AS min_amount_lost FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email FROM phishing_victims ORDER BY victim_name ASC;
SELECT victim_name, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims WHERE amount_lost > 1000;
SELECT victim_name, victim_email, attempt_date FROM phishing_victims JOIN phishing_attempts ON phishing_victims.victim_id = phishing_attempts.victim_id;
SELECT victim_name, outcome FROM phishing_victims JOIN phishing_attempts ON phishing_victims.victim_id = phishing_attempts.victim_id WHERE outcome = 'Failed';
SELECT * FROM phishing_victims;
SELECT victim_name, amount_lost FROM phishing_victims WHERE amount_lost > 1000;
SELECT pv.victim_name, pa.attempt_date FROM phishing_victims pv JOIN phishing_attempts pa ON pv.victim_id = pa.victim_id;
SELECT pv.victim_name, pa.outcome FROM phishing_victims pv LEFT JOIN phishing_attempts pa ON pv.victim_id = pa.victim_id ORDER BY pa.attempt_date DESC;

SELECT pv.victim_name, SUM(pa.amount_lost) AS total_amount_lost FROM phishing_victims pv JOIN phishing_attempts pa ON pv.victim_id = pa.victim_id GROUP BY pv.victim_name HAVING total_amount_lost > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount_lost DESC;
SELECT * FROM victim_information;
SELECT victim_name, email_address FROM victim_information WHERE victim_id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, phone_number FROM victim_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transaction ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM victim_information ORDER BY victim_id DESC;
SELECT victim_id, victim_name FROM victim_information WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM phishing_attempts WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT victim_name, phone_number FROM victim_information WHERE victim_id = 3;
SELECT victim_name, amount FROM victim_information JOIN financial_transaction ON victim_information.victim_id = financial_transaction.victim_id WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM victims ORDER BY victim_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT victim_id, victim_name, victim_email FROM victims WHERE victim_location = 'XYZ'
SELECT scam_type, scam_amount FROM scams WHERE scam_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT victim_name, victim_phone FROM victims WHERE victim_email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT victim_name,victim_email FROM victims WHERE victim_location = 'New York';

SELECT victim_name,scam_type,scam_amount FROM victims JOIN transactions ON victims.victim_id = transactions.victim_id JOIN scams ON scams.scam_id = transactions.scam_id WHERE scams.scam_type = 'Online Phishing';
SELECT scams.scam_type,scam_location,transactions.transaction_amount FROM scams JOIN transactions ON scams.scam_id = transactions.scam_id WHERE transactions.transaction_amount > 5000;

SELECT victim_name,scam_type,transaction_amount FROM victims JOIN transactions ON victims.victim_id = transactions.victim_id JOIN scams ON scams.scam_id = transactions.scam_id WHERE victim_location = 'California' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT victim_name, email_address FROM victims WHERE victim_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM phishing_emails WHERE received_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT sender_email, email_subject FROM phishing_emails ORDER BY received_date DESC;
SELECT victim_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM scam_reports GROUP BY victim_id HAVING total_reports > 2;
SELECT * FROM victims;
SELECT victim_name, email_address FROM victims WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY victim_name DESC;
SELECT victims.victim_name, phishing_emails.email_subject FROM victims JOIN phishing_emails ON victims.victim_id = phishing_emails.victim_id WHERE phishing_emails.received_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT scam_reports.report_date, scam_reports.scam_description, victims.victim_name FROM scam_reports JOIN victims ON scam_reports.victim_id = victims.victim_id WHERE scam_reports.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY scam_reports.report_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY transaction_type HAVING total_amount > 1000;
